track.name: Hiding My Heart
comments: cover of Brandi Carlile's song. Nice :)
"Like everything I've ever known, you'll disappear one day. So I'll spend my whole life hiding my heart away..."
Amazing cover of a beautiful song.
So beautiful. So emotional. So stunning. So amazing.
why is this song so beautiful?
This song is so beautiful it makes me want to cry and I am a grown man!!
Beautiful. Just beautiful. Way better than the original to my ears.
Brandi Carlile cover... but this one's beautiful too ;-)
I like this version, but prefer the original by Brandi Carlile. <3
